entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
